name: Super Stick Dragon VS Saiyan
description:
Enter into the arena and fight for the survival. this is the game which will amaze you with the swift handling and amazing features.

"Super Stick Dragon VS Saiyan" is a game of skill & fighting and need you to be really fast reactive to knockout your opponent.

Fight using a dynamic combat system and unleash devastating wrath attacks while freely navigating the battlefield using intuitive controller

FEATURES.

- Amazing graphics
- Easy controls
- Easy and Simple to play
- Cool transform effect
- Cool skill design and effect
- Ability to upgrade the Weapon, Gun and Armor ...
- Ability to scale up the levels
- Amazing sound effects
